title: Color Hoop Earrings Simple Thin Hoop Earrings 1 Inch Hoop Earrings
description: Divas Diggables TIP ABOUT SIZING EARRINGS TO FIND THE RIGHT SIZE: When buyers identify earrings as being too small or too big we always suggest they take a measuring ruler or tape and draw a line to the inch they are looking for before purchasing. Pictures can be deceiving as they are all magnified to show detail. WHEN YOU THINK OF ANY EARRINGS, PARTICULARLY HOOPS, WE WANT YOU TO THINK OF DIVASDIGGABLES ! WE QUEST TO FIND THE MOST STYLISH EARRINGS IN THE MOST VARIETY SHAPES AND SIZES POSSIBLE FOR EVERY KIND OF DIVA! BEFORE leaving us neutral or negative feedback, please give us the opportunity to address your concerns. We strive for 100% customer satisfaction AND we will answer any concern you have within 24 hrs guaranteed! THIS IS KEY IN MAKING YOUR JEWELRY LAST LONGER!!!!! If you buy costume jewelry please know that how fast it turns depends on the ph level in your skin and the metal it’s made of. Because we can’t determine what is the “turn factor” we STRONGLY SUGGEST if you buy inexpensive fashion jewelry you are getting a good deal --BUT with that deal you must coat your jewelry with clear fingernail polish BEFORE you wear it and let them dry or a coat of Kryolan clear varnish (the fingernail polish will do fine) in order to make them last MUCH longer than if you put them on right out of the package. THIS IS KEY IN MAKING YOUR JEWELRY LAST LONGER!!!!!
